🔐 Secure Password Generator - Quick & Customizable!

Create strong, unique passwords instantly with this powerful Chrome extension. Perfect for keeping your accounts secure without the hassle of thinking up complex passwords!

✨ KEY FEATURES:

· Generate passwords from 8-32 characters
· Customize with uppercase, lowercase, numbers & special characters
· One-click copy to clipboard
· Zero ads, zero tracking
· Completely free

🛡️ SECURITY FOCUSED:

· Generates passwords locally in your browser
· No password storage or transmission
· No data collection
· Uses secure random number generation

⚡ HOW IT WORKS:

· Click the extension icon
· Choose your password options
· Click "Generate"
· Copy with one click - done!

💪 PERFECT FOR:

· Creating strong account passwords
· Setting up new online services
· Updating old, weak passwords
· Generating temporary access codes
· Quick password creation for multiple accounts

🎯 WHY CHOOSE THIS EXTENSION?

· Instant access from your toolbar
· Clean, intuitive interface
· No website visits needed
· Minimal browser resources
· Regular security updates

🔒 PRIVACY PROMISE:

· No password storage
· No cloud services
· No analytics
· 100% private & local

Download now and never use a weak password again!
